description: Coherence thresholds calibrated using multi-run VLM aggregation with variance-aware bands. Version 3.2.1 adjusts for single-run VLM variance (can be 5-10 points below 3-run median).

calibration.notes: Thresholds based on 3-run aggregated medians. WARN margin is variance-aware: max(5, 2*stdDev). Single-run mode can score 5-10 points below median, so minOverall thresholds are set 10+ points below median for reliable gating.

thresholdStrategy.description: Failure thresholds are hard gates; samples below these FAIL. Warning thresholds use variance-aware bands: warnMargin = max(5, 2*stdDev). For artifacts, lower is better, so maxArtifactSeverity is the FAIL threshold.

sample-001-geometric.notes: Static spinning top. 1-run mode can score as low as 85 vs 97 median (12 point variance!). Threshold set 15 points below median.

sample-002-character.notes: Character head turn - perfect 3-run median scores. 1-run mode can score 94, so threshold set 10 points below median to accommodate single-run VLM variance.

sample-003-environment.notes: Camera pan across cafe. Moderate variance (stdDev=2.36) - WARN margin set to 5 (> 2*stdDev).

sample-004-motion.notes: Person walking - perfect scores with zero variance. High quality reference sample.

sample-005-complex.notes: Complex time-lapse with HIGHEST variance (stdDev=3.77). WARN margin set to 8 (2*stdDev). One run scored 80 with artifact=30, others 88 with artifact=10. Thresholds set to accommodate variance.

humanReview.notes: High VLM variance indicates this sample is at the edge of model capability. Lens flare artifacts visible in end frame.

sample-006-multichar.notes: Mug + barista depth scene. Zero variance across 3 runs. Thresholds set 5 points below median for stable gating.

humanReview.notes: User reported vessel changes and extra cup appearing. Hardened prompts applied.

sample-007-occlusion.notes: Occlusion test. Zero variance despite challenging scenario. Relaxed artifact threshold for scenarios with partial occlusion.

sample-008-lighting.notes: Lighting transition. 1-run mode can score 88 vs 95 median, so threshold set 12 points below median to accommodate single-run VLM variance.

humanReview.notes: User reported flicker and Ring-style flashes. Hardened prompts applied.
